name: C. Make it Increasing
statement:
You are given an array a consisting of n positive integers, and an array
b, with length n. Initially b_i=0 for each 1
leq i
leq n.In one move you can choose an integer i (1
leq i
leq n), and add a_i to b_i or subtract a_i from b_i. What is the minimum
number of moves needed to make b increasing (that is, every element is
strictly greater than every element before it)?
